verses.text: Then all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w Uzziah|strong="H5818"\w*, who \add was\add* \w sixteen|strong="H8337"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w*, and made him \w king|strong="H4427"\w* in the room of his \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w Amaziah|strong="H0558"\w*.\f + \fr 26.1 \ft Uzziah: or, Azariah\f*

¶ Now the \w rest|strong="H3499"\w* of the \w acts|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Uzziah|strong="H5818"\w*, \w first|strong="H7223"\w* and \w last|strong="H0314"\w*, did \w Isaiah|strong="H3470"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Amoz|strong="H0531"\w*, \w write|strong="H3789"\w*.
